sentences.en: Alpha-Bravo-Zulu 643 to Saltezar, do you read me? Over.
sentences.cn: 阿尔法－布拉沃－祖鲁643呼叫萨德扎，能听到我的声音吗？完毕。

sentences.en: And why should an English speaker be barred from reading blogs written in Malagasy or Zulu?
sentences.cn: 而且为什么用马达加斯加语或者祖鲁族语写的博客，说英语的人就看不了呢？

sentences.en: Some say its name comes from the Zulu language, others that it derives from township slang.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为它的名字来源于祖鲁语, 还有人说它的名字来源于城镇俚语.

sentences.en: They are incorporated into the Zulu empire.
This Zulu Proverb can be applied to leadership in Africa today.
sentences.cn: 今天，祖鲁族人这句谚语可以应用到非洲的领导身上。

sentences.en: Zulu and Xhosa version will be available soon and other languages will follow.
sentences.cn: 祖鲁和科萨翻译的《圣经》和其它语种的《圣经》将很快提供给手机用户.

trans.tran_cn: 祖鲁人（非洲东南部班图族的一支），祖鲁语，[电影]祖鲁战争
trans.tran_en: someone who belongs to a race of black people who live in South Africa
